oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photographic directory : faculty and administration, Fall 1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Middle Tennessee State University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Directory of faculty and administrative personnel at the University during 1975. A portrait photo of each person is provided. Arranged alphabetically.
